title: Information Systems Programming
subtitle: Higher Technical Professional Course
institution: Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão de Leiria
description: Developed skills in programming languages such as C, PHP, JavaScript, Java.
Gained experience in web development using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript.
Learned about database management systems and SQL.
Participated in group projects to design and implement software solutions.

title: Technical Course in Sports
subtitle: High School
description: Develop the annual training plan in collaboration with senior sports coaches responsible for the discipline.
Organize and coordinate training sessions, ensuring the safety and well-being of all participants.
Monitor and evaluate the performance of athletes, providing feedback and guidance to help them improve their skills.
Collaborate in evaluating training outcomes based on alignment with established objectives, under the supervision of a senior coach.
Gained practical experience through internships in local sports organizations.
